content:
As hard as it is to believe, your peaceful little town has been infiltrated by the dastardly mafia and something must be done about this! You look for guidance from the town's longtime leader Zachrulez, but find that the mafia is one step ahead, as he's found in a bloody mess in his office. He tries to utter out the names of the perpetrators with his dying breath, but death takes him before anything can be uttered. Well crap... looks like you guys are on your own. There's only one solution to this problem. Some good old fashioned mob lynching!

Players Alive:

1.Robcapone
3. Rain Mute
5. Empking Guderian
7. Llamagod (FakeGod and Llamarble hydra)
9. GreyICE Rosswilliam
12. Ellibereth
13. Pappums rat

Players dead:

1. Zachrulez (Town-Mod) gutted alive in pre-game
2. AGar (Town Mason) killed day 1
3. Jerbs (Mafia Goon) lynched day 1
4. VP Baltar (Vanilla Townie) killed night 1
5. Zdenek Dizzle (Mafia Goon) killed day 2
6. Locke Lamora Vigilante Ventriloquist Carrotcake (Town Neighbor) lynched day 2
7. Tasky (Vanilla Townie) killed night 2

General Rules:

Do not talk about the game outside of it unless your role allows you to.

Do not edit or delete your posts in anyway. (Assuming you have the power to do so.)

Do not quote any moderator pms sent to you by me. (This includes role pms and all aspects of the role pm. (ex: Timestamps of role pms))

Feel free to PM me with any questions or concerns you have. I will make in game announcements if appropriate.

Do not use any font size other than normal please. I will warn violaters, and will modkill repeat offenders. Don't try to hide text or make it difficult to read either. (Also, absolutely no encrypted text of any kind.)

Once you're dead, stop typing. (I will allow one contentless "bah" post as an exception.)

Please treat the other players in the game with respect. I do not want to have to intervene if the game starts to get personal, but I will if I have to.

Do not talk about ongoing games please.

This is my color, don't use it.

I reserve the right to add, remove and change rules as I see fit to improve the quality of the game. I will also clarify the rules as needed.

Modkills will end the day. (Breaking or pretending to break any rule on my ruleset may be grounds for this at my discretion. Your role will be changed to neutral survivor and you will automatically lose the game if you are modkilled, so be forewarned.)

Gameplay Rules

Each day the town decides on a lynch. You will require one half of the living players plus one in order to achieve a lynching majority. I will go out of my way to make sure you are aware of this number. Be aware that you must achieve this threshold for a lynch, even at deadline. (No lynch will occur at deadline if there's no majority.)

To vote please do so in this format Vote: Zachrulez Please bold your vote and try to put it at the bottom of your post. (Not required but appreciated.) Failure to vote in the bold format may result in the vote not being counted. (At my discretion I will determine vote intent.)

Unvoting is appreciated, but not required. Please post it in bold if you do it.

No lynch is also allowed, under the same format. Vote: No Lynch A majority vote for no lynch will send the game into night without a lynch.

Deadline for each day will be 2 weeks

You are subject to a mod prod after 72 hours of inactivity. Players may request a prod after 48 hours themselves if they you haven't posted in that time frame. You will have 48 hours to respond to a prod in thread before I start searching for a replacement.

If you are unable to meet the minimum posting requirements for any reason, please let us know in thread. Don't leave us hanging.

Once a majority is reached, that player is lynched and can not be saved with unvotes. All players including the lynched player are free to continue posting until I get around to locking the thread.

Night will last a maximum of 3 days under normal circumstances. Night actions for relevant players are due within this time frame. If I do not receive an action from a player who has one, it will be forfeited.

Last and Most importantly, have fun!

Lastly, the vanilla town role pm will look like this.

You are a vanilla townie. You possess no powers other than your brain and your vote, use them wisely. You win when you eliminate all threats to the town.
Role Pms are out. Please confirm by pming me your role name. Day 1 will begin once everyone has confirmed.

Waiting on 2 confirms, but I won't hold up the game any longer, so I'll go ahead and start day 1.

Not voting: (Robcapone, AGar, Mute, VP Baltar, Guderian, Jerbs, Llamagod, Tasky, Rosswilliam, Dizzle, Carrotcake, Ellibereth, Pappums rat)

With 13 alive it's 7 to lynch

Day 1 will end no later than Friday Jan 14th at 3pm CST
